title.content-text: 6.3.1 - Configuring and Propagating a Default Route

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts six routers connected in a pentagonal-shaped topology. R3 is at the center of the topology. R1 is labeled as the ASBR and there is a dedicated serial link from R1 to the ISP . This network forms an Enterprise A S.

R1 announces, "I have a default route to the ISP . I will send it to the other routers within my A S."
